thread.title: Listen to Yo-Yo Ma's Rendition of The Simpsons Theme
thread.title_full: Listen to Yo-Yo Ma's Rendition of The Simpsons Theme

author: Joyce Eng, TV GUIDE
title: Listen to Yo-Yo Ma's Rendition of The Simpsons Theme
text:
Yo-Yo Ma, The Simpsons | Photo Credits: Fox Yo-Yo Ma, The Simpsons | Photo Credits: Fox Listen to Yo-Yo Ma's Rendition of The Simpsons Theme 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
The Simpsons got classical on Sunday's episode. 
Not only did Yo-Yo Ma make a cameo as himself in the episode -- to help Mr. Burns serenade Mrs. Bouvier -- but the renowned cellist performed the show's theme song, which played over the closing credits. Take a listen: 
Asked on Twitter how the show nabbed Ma, executive producer Al Jean said, "We asked and he said yes; lucky us." @DavidNgLAT @TheSimpsons We asked and he said yes; lucky us - Al Jean (@AlJean) October 12, 2015
